Title: Provides that a police officer in the county of Westchester can be suspended without pay for not more than 30 days pending a trial of disciplinary charges
Summary: Provides that a police officer in the county of Westchester can be suspended without pay for not more than 30 days pending a trial of disciplinary charges.
LawCode: Amd ยง7, Chap 104 of 1936; amd ยง18, Chap 891 of 1972
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 104 of the laws of 1936 relating to providing for the establishment, organization and operation of police departments in the towns of Westchester county and chapter 891 of the laws of 1972 relating to continuing special provisions relating to police departments of certain villages, in relation to suspension of an officer pending a trial of disciplinary charges
